text: (ovun pavasana ayurin) niyata vaśayenma (venat) kurānayak tibī emagin kan̆du gaman karavanu læbuvē nam hō emagin mahapoḷova ven karanu læbuvē nam hō emagin maḷavun katā karavanu læbuvē nam hō (ovuhu viśvāsa nokarati.) namut siyalu karuṇu allāh satuya. allāh abhimata karannē nam siyalu janayā haṭa ohu maga penvannaṭa tibuṇu bava viśvāsa kaḷavun nodæna siṭiyō da? allāhgē pratignāva pæmiṇena tek pratikṣēpa kaḷavun ovun sidu kaḷa dǣ hētuven ovunaṭa arbudayak æti vīma hō ovungē nagarayaṭa samīpayen eya(arbuda ya) sidu vīma akhaṇḍa va pavatinu æta. niyata vaśayenma allāh pratignā va kaḍa nokarayi
